common.machineId.comment: An identifier provided by VS Code to relate coding sessions from the same installation together

common.extname.comment: The name of the Slint extension

common.extversion.comment: The version of the Slint extension

common.vscodeversion.comment: The version of VS Code running the extension

common.platform.comment: The platform/OS the extension is running on

commmon.language.comment: The user's language as reported by VS Code
